data.title: When does 'Outer Banks' season 4 come out? What to know about the Netflix series
data.meta_description: Calling all Pogues and Kooks! Here's everything you need to know about season 4 of the hit Netflix series \
data.text:
Calling all Pogues and Kooks! Get ready for the treasure hunt of a lifetime.

Netflix confirmed it will soon release "Outer Banks" season 4. The popular teen drama, created by Josh and Jonas Pate and Shannon Burke, follows a group of teenagers, aka the Pogues, who go on a quest to find lost treasure in the Outer Banks of North Carolina.

The series stars Chase Stokes (John B.), Madelyn Cline (Sarah Cameron), Madison Bailey (Kiara), Jonathan Daviss (Pope), Rudy Pankow (JJ) and others.

But when will season 4 be available for streaming? Here's everything you need to know about the hit Netflix series.

When does 'Outer Banks' season 4 come out?

A release date for "Outer Banks" season 4 has yet to be announced, but Netflix confirmed it will release sometime in 2024, per People magazine. The first three seasons of the series are available to stream on Netflix.

What will 'Outer Banks' season 4 be about?

According to People, season 4 will include an 18-month time jump that follows the Pogues as they are honored for their discovery of El Dorado, which took place at the end of season 3. The Pogues will also embark on a new adventure searching for Pirate Blackbeard's hidden treasure.

People magazine adds that the characters will deal with self-doubt in the upcoming season. John B. and Sarah will also grapple with the loss of their fathers, Ward (Charles Esten) and Big John (Charles Halford).

Which cast members are returning for 'Outer Banks' season 4?

The main cast, including Stokes, Cline, Bailey, Daviss, Panko, Carlacia Grant, Austin North and Drew Starkey will return for season 4, along with Fiona Palomo, who has been upgraded to a series regular. Several new actors will also join the cast, including J. Anthony Crane, Pollyanna McIntosh, Brianna Brown, Rigo Sanchez and Mia Challis.

How old are the cast members of 'Outer Banks'?

Here are the real ages of the "Outer Banks" cast.

Madelyn Cline (Sarah Cameron): 26.

Chase Stokes (John B.): 31.

Madison Bailey (Kiara): 25.

Jonathan Daviss (Pope): 24.

Rudy Pankow (JJ): 25.

Drew Starkey (Rafe): 30.

Austin North (Topper): 27.

Julia Antonelli (Wheezie Cameron): 21.

Carlacia Grant (Cleo): 33.

Will there be a season 5 of 'Outer Banks'?
